<h3 id="X30304">X(30304) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-CONWAY AND SUBMEDIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^5+(b+c)*a^4-2*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a^2+(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(-3*b^2-2*b*c-3*c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30304) = 3*X(57)-2*X(19541) = 3*X(165)-2*X(200) = 4*X(997)-5*X(7987) = 3*X(1699)-4*X(11019) = 3*X(1750)-4*X(19541) = 2*X(5720)-3*X(21164) = 3*X(9778)-X(20015)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(9306). X(30304) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30304) lies on these lines:
{1,84}, {2,11407}, {3,3929}, {4,553}, {7,1699}, {9,10167}, {20,519}, {21,30363}, {40,5918}, {46,12671}, {57,971}, {63,100}, {65,10864}, {72,9841}, {223,7004}, {354,11372}, {388,9948}, {515,2093}, {516,9965}, {518,7994}, {610,8558}, {912,6282}, {936,12528}, {942,12684}, {944,14646}, {950,12246}, {997,5267}, {1210,6223}, {1490,1708}, {1728,9942}, {1765,3731}, {1776,6261}, {2808,3784}, {2951,15733}, {3057,9845}, {3158,17613}, {3219,21153}, {3333,12688}, {3339,4292}, {3361,9960}, {3522,3951}, {3576,3683}, {3586,5768}, {3679,6916}, {3742,16112}, {3868,11531}, {3874,12651}, {3911,5658}, {3928,7580}, {4197,30315}, {4297,12526}, {4304,9819}, {4313,30337}, {4350,8835}, {4654,8727}, {4866,9588}, {5220,10178}, {5249,7988}, {5272,9355}, {5273,5785}, {5400,8056}, {5437,5927}, {5587,12678}, {5720,21164}, {5735,10431}, {5779,7308}, {5784,8580}, {5787,9579}, {5851,24703}, {5882,10385}, {6173,8226}, {6245,6844}, {6259,9581}, {6260,6969}, {6883,7330}, {6950,18446}, {6993,7989}, {7291,9572}, {7489,18443}, {7962,30283}, {7996,10444}, {9778,20015}, {9949,12577}, {10122,18219}, {10202,18540}, {10270,17857}, {10384,12915}, {10861,30291}, {10883,30308}, {11020,24644}, {11036,30343}, {11520,16189}, {11888,30371}, {11889,30395}, {11890,30394}, {18389,18421}, {18444,30392}, {20307,26932}</p>
<p>
X(30304) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {7991, 18452}, {9965, 10430}<br>
X(30304) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1750, 57), (3586, 5768), (5691, 18391), (6282, 7171), (7962, 30283), (7994, 10860)<br>
X(30304) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (10085, 15071, 1), (12675, 12705, 1)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
